text: Hrvatske Narodne Pjesme 1 is an album by a Herzegovinian singer Mate Bulić. It contains an assortment of traditional Croatian songs. Track 7 is a duet with Anica Martinović. ==Track listing== # "Tebi Majko Misli Lete" # "Zelen Lišće Goru Kiti" # "Golubice Bijela" # "Jedno Jutro Čim Je Zora Svanula" # "Oj Livado Rosna Travo" # "Moja Mila Kato" # "Puni Vjetre" # "Djevojka Je Zelen Bor Sadila" # "Sedamdeset I Dva Dana" # "Siroče Sam" # "Jednog Jutra Čim Stigoh Doma" Category:Mate Bulić albums Category:1998 albums
title: Hrvatske narodne pjesme
